result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James Allen Rhodes Jr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant James Allen Rhodes Jr not in court, in custody.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Attorney Flynn for James Allen Rhodes Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense needs discovery and an offer and is requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 12-5-22 at 8:30 am for status conference by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant James Allen Rhodes Jr appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz appeared by video for James Allen Rhodes Jr.  Attorney Amy E Spanczak appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Case retabbed to DV intake judge of the week. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with Sarah A L.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
